rules.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, able-ism, etc.
No incitement of violence, promotion of violent ideologies or violent behaviour of any manner.
No doxxing, dogpiling or harassment in any form of other users.
No media and content which is sexual or violent in nature.
No harmful, manipulated, or misleading information (e.g., regarding elections, public health)
In order to be able to moderate this server, posts need to either be written in Dutch or English.
